verses.verse: Say <WH559> ye unto your brethren <WH251>, Ammi <WH5971>; and to your sisters <WH269>, Ruhamah <WH7355>.

Contend <WH7378> with your mother <WH517>, contend <WH7378>; for she is not my wife <WH802>, neither am I her husband <WH376>; and let her put away <WH5493> her whoredoms <WH2183> from her face <WH6440>, and her adulteries <WH5005> from between her breasts <WH7699>;

lest I strip <WH6584> her naked <WH6174>, and set <WH3322> her as in the day <WH3117> that she was born <WH3205>, and make <WH7760> her as a wilderness <WH4057>, and set <WH7896> her like a dry <WH6723> land <WH776>, and slay <WH4191> her with thirst <WH6772>.
Yea <WH1121>, upon her children will I have no mercy <WH7355>; for they are children <WH1121> of whoredom <WH2183>;

for their mother <WH517> hath played the harlot <WH2181>; she that conceived <WH2029> them hath done shamefully <WH3001>; for she said <WH559>, I will go <WH3212> after <WH310> my lovers <WH157>, that give <WH5414> me my bread <WH3899> and my water <WH4325>, my wool <WH6785> and my flax <WH6593>, mine oil <WH8081> and my drink <WH8250>.
Therefore <WH7753>, behold, I will hedge up thy way <WH1870> with thorns <WH5518>, and I will build <WH1443> a wall <WH1447> against her <WH4672>, that she shall not find her paths <WH5410>.

And she shall follow <WH7291> after her lovers <WH157>, but she shall not overtake <WH5381> them <WH1245>; and she shall seek them <WH4672>, but shall not find them <WH559>: then shall she say, I will go <WH3212> and return <WH7725> to my first <WH7223> husband <WH376>; for then was it better <WH2896> with me than now <WH6258>.

For she did not know <WH3045> that I gave <WH5414> her the grain <WH1715>, and the new wine <WH8492>, and the oil <WH3323>, and multiplied <WH7235> unto her silver <WH3701> and gold <WH2091>, which they used <WH6213> for Baal <WH1168>.

Therefore will I take <WH3947> back <WH7725> my grain <WH1715> in the time <WH6256> thereof <WH8492>, and my new wine in the season <WH4150> thereof <WH5337>, and will pluck away my wool <WH6785> and my flax <WH6593> which should have covered <WH3680> her nakedness <WH6172>.
And now will I uncover <WH1540> her lewdness <WH5040> in the sight <WH5869> of her lovers <WH157>, and none <WH376> shall deliver <WH5337> her out of my hand <WH3027>.
I will also cause all her mirth <WH4885> to cease <WH7673>, her feasts <WH2282>, her new moons <WH2320>, and her sabbaths <WH7676>, and all her solemn assemblies <WH4150>.

And I will lay waste <WH8074> her vines <WH1612> and her fig-trees <WH8384>, whereof she hath said <WH559>, These are my hire <WH866> that my lovers <WH157> have given <WH5414> me <WH7760>; and I will make them a forest <WH3293>, and the beasts <WH2416> of the field <WH7704> shall eat them <WH398>.

And I will visit <WH6485> upon her the days <WH3117> of the Baalim <WH1168>, unto which she burned incense <WH6999>, when she decked <WH5710> herself with her ear-rings <WH5141> and her jewels <WH2484>, and went <WH3212> after <WH310> her lovers <WH157>, and forgat <WH7911> me <WH5002>, saith Jehovah <WH3068>.
Therefore <WH6601>, behold, I will allure her <WH3212>, and bring her into the wilderness <WH4057>, and speak <WH1696> comfortably unto her <WH3820>.

And I will give <WH5414> her her vineyards <WH3754> from thence <WH6010>, and the valley of Achor <WH5911> for a door <WH6607> of hope <WH8615>; and she shall make answer <WH6030> there <WH3117>, as in the days of her youth <WH5271>, and as in the day <WH3117> when she came up <WH5927> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.
And it shall be at that day <WH3117>, saith <WH5002> Jehovah <WH3068>, that thou shalt call <WH7121> me Ishi <WH376>, and shalt call <WH7121> me no more Baali <WH1180>.
For I will take away <WH5493> the names <WH8034> of the Baalim <WH1168> out of her mouth <WH6310>, and they shall no more be mentioned <WH2142> by their name <WH8034>.

And in that day <WH3117> will I make <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> for them with the beasts <WH2416> of the field <WH7704>, and with the birds <WH5775> of the heavens <WH8064>, and with the creeping things <WH7431> of the ground <WH127>: and I will break <WH7665> the bow <WH7198> and the sword <WH2719> and the battle <WH4421> out of the land <WH776>, and will make them to lie down <WH7901> safely <WH983>.

And I will betroth <WH781> thee unto me for ever <WH5769>; yea <WH781>, I will betroth thee unto me in righteousness <WH6664>, and in justice <WH4941>, and in lovingkindness <WH2617>, and in mercies <WH7356>.
I will even betroth <WH781> thee unto me in faithfulness <WH530>; and thou shalt know <WH3045> Jehovah <WH3068>.
And it shall come to pass in that day <WH3117>, I will answer <WH6030>, saith <WH5002> Jehovah <WH3068>, I will answer <WH6030> the heavens <WH8064>, and they shall answer <WH6030> the earth <WH776>;
and the earth <WH776> shall answer <WH6030> the grain <WH1715>, and the new wine <WH8492>, and the oil <WH3323>; and they shall answer <WH6030> Jezreel <WH3157>.

And I will sow <WH2232> her unto me in the earth <WH776>; and I will have mercy <WH7355> upon her that had not obtained mercy <WH7355>; and I will say <WH559> to them that were not my people <WH5971>, Thou art my people <WH5971>; and they shall say <WH559>, Thou art my God <WH430>.
